content: Every so often, he’ll decline the lunge, and simply swing his sword up to send a projectile slash your way. The good news is it's rare and just a single slash, moving slow enough that it can be dodged reliably well.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard_(Kingdom_of_Sahali).md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard (Kingdom of Sahali)', specifically from the subsection '"Tiger Vanguard" Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Every so often, he’ll decline the lunge, and simply swing his sword up to send a projectile slash your way. The good news is it's rare and just a single slash, moving slow enough that it can be dodged reliably well.
